skillTree.localised_description: Enables the Barded Warhorse

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "For the King! Charge", while this Mount is equipped, for Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

Passive Ability: "For the King! Charge" for Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: As the King and the Lady hoped, the exile has made this man more humble and much stronger than ever, returning to defend the kingdom as a shining beacon of faith, honor and purity.

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: When the evil and tainted ones place the yoke of slavery upon the necks of honest commoners, and turn their good works to foul ends, that is a sin of unforgivable magnitude. There is only one punishment fitting for such abominable tyrants… Death

effects.description:
Enemy Morale -5 when fighting against Chaos, Skaven and Dark Elf faction
	(local region)

Weapon Strength: +6% when fighting against Chaos, Skaven and Dark Elf factions
	(Lord's army)

Enemy Morale -10 when fighting against Chaos, Skaven and Dark Elf faction
	(local region)

Weapon Strength: +8% when fighting against Chaos, Skaven and Dark Elf factions
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Such is the purity and unshakable faith of a Hermit Knight that foul magics wane and fade wherever he treads

effects.description:
Enemy Morale -5 when fighting against Vampire and Vampire Count factions
	(local region)

Enemy Morale -10 when fighting against Vampire and Vampire Count factions
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: I have fought across the world in the King’s name. I have slaughtered greenskins, undead and Chaos worshippers for the honour of the Lady. I have known glorious victory… and painful defeat. Yet I shall never tire, never cease and never relent, for ours is a duty that will never end

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
Led by noble example, peasants fight longer and harder lest their Lord be dishonoured.
Thorough drilling increases the peasants' chances of withstanding the horrors of battle.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Lady's blessing is a wondrous gift freely graced upon all Bretonnian subjects, should they but kneel and utter their devotion.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Blessing of the Lady"

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Though a Hermit Knight has no subjects of his own, he will march to protect the commoners as soon as they come asking for aid
Though peasants are not the most reliable soldiers, a Hermit Knight knows that they will fight much harder when their families and home are in inmediate danger

skillTree.localised_description: When need arises, supplies stored in different places are gathered and put to good use
When the youngest knights in a hundred miles hear that a Hermit Knight rides to battle, they will march night and day with the hope of fighting alongside such a legend

skillTree.localised_description: If the invaders keep fighting, even believing they can win, it is the noble's duty and pleasure to disabuse them of that notion. Usually with a thundering final charge in the name of the King and the Lady

skillTree.localised_description: Often, the first sign of reinforcements is a force of the bravest knights, sent by the King himself, falling from the sky to crush the very center of the enemy lines

skillTree.localised_description: In times of direst need, the Lady herself summons her champions from all Bretonnia and sends them to help in the defence of her most sacred places

skillTree.localised_description: When the alternative probably involves being killed by their own side, the smallfolk tend to rise to the occasion...

skillTree.localised_description: There are literally no opponents too great for them to face down. None.

skillTree.localised_description: Thou shalt be everywhere and always the champion of the Right and the Good against Injustice and Evil.

skillTree.localised_description: Many Bretonnian veterans speak of a soothing presence felt on occasion in the heat of battle, helping them to find their mark and keep their cool.

effects.description:
Range: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
As an expert in such matters, it is their duty to know the king's law and to mete justice in his name.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
When the lands are safer, the tax collectors are safer too
They've seen the Lady's acts or witnessed her blessed grace.
Those whom the Lady has blessed fight with an unquenchable, almost super-human zeal, for they know that she sees them.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Hermit Knights have chosen to defend the sacred places of the Lady and peasants in the region will take his presence as a blessing
The knowledge that they fight in the king's name, with his support, steels an army for the privations of the siege.
This being must be touched by Tzeentch, seeing things before they happen.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +8%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Lords must not be concerned with the collecting of taxes; there are others whose lot it is to feel the people's scorn.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A hermit-Knight, this one nevertheless always returns to fight for his beloved king.
